code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import API from"../utils/api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Profile=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfile=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const res=await API.get("/users/me",{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setUser(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Error fetching user profile:",err);}};fetchProfile();},[]);if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-500 p-10",children:"Loading profile..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-md mx-auto bg-white p-6 rounded-xl shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"My Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Full Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:user.username})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:user.email})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:"Joined On"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:new Date(user.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()})]})]});};export default Profile;
